Race.SpecificTitle: Garbage District No. 1 -- 11.67 Mills Renewal - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Garbage District No. 1 of the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eleven and sixty-seven hundredths (11.67) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $470,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2025, for the purpose of providing and maintaining garbage collection and disposal services for the District, including necessary equipment and facilities therefor?
